 You can use PayPal to pay for products on my 
 store.




Templates


Templates
 are "complete games," designed to teach you.  You can also use them to make your own games to sell or give away.

No longer available.

Plugins

SUPERCHARGING 
Corona
 game development every day.  
Get It Now!










Tools


Tools
(tools) are complete solutions to common Corona game and app design problems.








Docs


Price


Description










RGPE2


FREE


Roaming Gamer Particle Editor 2
 (aka RGPE2) is a 
FREE
 particle editor for creating emitter definition files for use with the 
Corona
 
newEmitter()
 function.








Requesting Something


Do you have a cool idea?  Am I missing a product that is critical to your game or app?


Whatever the case, you can ask me to make it 
HERE
.  Just make a post with these details:




Title
 - Roaming Gamer: Can You Make XYZ?


Body
 - Describe the thing you want me to make.  Try to be as clear as possible.




I will respond as soon as I see the post and we will proceed from there.  


Thank You!




  Copyright 
 Roaming Gamer, LLC. 2008-2017; All Rights Reserved
